Model: A0: Produce in a circular economy


Description

The full production model consists of five life cycle activities (Design Product, Acquire Materials, Produce Product, Use and Consume, and Treat at End of Life) that are consistent with manufacturing economic models. Click each shaded activity box to view further decompositions.

Parent Activity: Produce in a circular economy
